level.heading: Freedom of information act disclosure.
level.text: All data collected and maintained as part of the reporting obligations imposed by this subchapter shall be fully subject to, and comply with, subchapter II of Chapter 5 of this title [ยง 2-531 et seq.].

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2255 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-223
level.text: For Law 18-223, see notes following ยง 2-1208.01.
